Listing 15.14: Example of a function for the repeated evaluation of a model.
15.3.5 Grid Search
We now have all the pieces of the framework. All that is left is a function to drive the search. We
can deﬁne a grid search() function that takes the dataset, a list of conﬁgurations to search,
and the number of observations to use as the test set and perform the search. Once mean scores
